thread.title: Anon. - Doylestown, PA
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Anon. - Doylestown, PA

author: Anon. - Doylestown, PA
title: Anon. - Doylestown, PA
text: I bought an after-shave lotion for myself as a Christmas present that I had not been able to find in a store. It was $55. When it came I was bowled over by Dior's beautiful box and wrapping which totally brightened my day. Way above what I expected!
